thread.title: UK surgeon returns to find injured Syrian baby
thread.title_full: UK surgeon returns to find injured Syrian baby

title: UK surgeon returns to find injured Syrian baby
text:
Media playback is unsupported on your device UK surgeon David Nott visits Turkey to find baby he helped in Syria 1 March 2017 Last updated at 17:04 GMT 
She was the baby girl he says he couldn't forget. 
Two months ago, British surgeon David Nott travelled to Syria to operate on a little girl called Maram. 
She was gravely injured in an attack as she fled Aleppo with her family. 
Her parents and siblings were killed. Read more
